What is the net worth of mukesh ambani?

According to the latest information, Mukesh Ambani's net worth is around $106.5 billion as of April 30, 2025. However, please note that his net worth can fluctuate and may have changed since the last update.
Could not recognize any speech.
It seems like there was no question or statement to process. If you'd like to ask or say something, I'm here to help!
Jarvis can you tell a story in hindi?

Here's a short story in Hindi:

एक बार एक जंगल में एक छोटा सा लड़का रहता था। वह लड़का बहुत ही नेकदिल था और जंगल के सभी जानवरों से दोस्ती रखता था। एक दिन जंगल में एक भयानक आग लग गई। लड़के ने देखा कि सभी जानवर भाग रहे हैं, लेकिन एक बूढ़ी हिरनी पीछे रह गई थी। लड़के ने उस हिरनी को बचाया और जंगल से निकाल कर सुरक्षित स्थान पर पहुँचाया। हिरनी ने लड़के का शुक्रिया अदा किया और कहा कि मैं तुम्हें एक वरदान दूँगी। लड़के ने कहा कि मुझे कोई वरदान नहीं चाहिए, लेकिन हिरनी ने कहा कि मैं तुम्हें एक ऐसा वरदान दूँगी जिससे तुम कभी भी भूखा नहीं रहोगे। और फिर हिरनी ने लड़के को एक जादुई फल दिया जिसको खाने से लड़के को कभी भी भूखा नहीं लगा।

Translation: Once upon a time, there was a little boy living in a forest. He was very kind and friendly with all the animals in the forest. One day, a massive fire broke out in the forest. The boy saw that all the animals were running away, but an old deer was left behind. The boy saved the deer and took her to a safe place. The deer thanked the boy and said she would give him a blessing. The boy said he didn't want any blessing, but the deer insisted and gave him a magical fruit that would keep him from ever feeling hungry again.
Can you read out properly?

I apologize for any difficulties in understanding the text. As a digital AI assistant, I don't have the capability to read out loud or produce audio. I can only provide text-based responses. However, I can try to help you with the pronunciation of the Hindi text I provided earlier. If you'd like, I can break down the text into smaller parts and provide a phonetic transcription to help you with the pronunciation. Let me know if that would be helpful!
What's the time right now?
The current time is 17 hours, 42 minutes, and 05 seconds.
Change into am and pm.
The current time is 5:42 PM.
Can you bucket rail ticket for me from irctc?

I'm happy to help! However, as a text-based AI assistant, I don't have the capability to directly book or purchase rail tickets from IRCTC or any other website. But I can guide you through the process or provide you with the necessary information to book a ticket yourself.

To book a rail ticket from IRCTC, you can follow these steps:

1. Go to the IRCTC website ([www.irctc.co.in](http://www.irctc.co.in)) and log in to your account.
2. Enter your journey details, such as the source and destination stations, travel date, and class of travel.
3. Search for available trains and select the desired train and class.
4. Enter passenger details and proceed to payment.
5. Make the payment using a valid payment method.

If you need any assistance with the process or have any specific questions, feel free to ask, and I'll do my best to help!
